name: Finger Shot RPG: Intro
description:
This game is a brand new role playing game.
Finger Shot R.P.G.
***ONLINE MULTIPLAYER VIA GAME CENTER***

You can control all the motions of your units on the battle field by just dragging and launching.

Dive in New R.P.G Game!

Features

- Simple control! Drag and Release to Launch the unit!
- unit can be upgraded up to level 15
- Supports zoom-in and zoom-out the map
- 10 maps with various size of the battle field
- Supports the online multiplayer mode via the Game Center on Wi-Fi or 3G network.
- Supports Leaderboards and Achievements via the Game Center
- Fantastic soundFX and BGM
- TURN FIGHT REQUEST SYSTEM
